snippet: The journalist, Du Bin, recently released a documentary about a forced-labor camp and has worked as a freelance photographer for The New York Times.
abstract: Du Bin, Chinese journalist who released documentary about forced-labor camp and has worked as freelance photographer for The New York Times, is detained by police officers in Beijing.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting from Beijing, and Chris Buckley from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The journalist, Du Bin, recently released a documentary about a forced-labor camp and has worked as a freelance photographer for The New York Times.

headline.main: Journalist Held in Beijing, Friends Say
headline.print_headline: Journalist Held In Beijing, Friends Say
